vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.9.26;
father of: Gaal (H1603)
§ Ebed = "servant"
1) father of Gaal in the time of the judges
2) son of Jonathan and one of the sons of Adin who returned from exile with Ezra
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   esclavo, sirviente; (2a)   padre de Gáal; en tiempos de los jueces; (2b)   hijo de Jonatán; descendiente de Adín; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以別 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "僕人"
1) 士師時代的人, 迦勒的父親 (士 9:26)
2) 約拿單的兒子, 亞丁的後裔, 他是隨以斯拉回歸的人之一 (拉 8:6)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以别 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "仆人"
1) 士师时代的人, 迦勒的父亲 (士 9:26)
2) 约拿单的儿子, 亚丁的后裔, 他是随以斯拉回归的人之一 (拉 8:6)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.8.6;
son of: Jonathan (H3129H)
§ Ebed = "servant"
1) father of Gaal in the time of the judges
2) son of Jonathan and one of the sons of Adin who returned from exile with Ezra
